Text:
Hello and thank you for the torrent. 5 stars

Everything works perfectly...except one little thing installing Titanium Backup PRO:

You mention: "Select 'Custom patch!", but it appears a bunch of other options but not that one and i have no idea what to do or choose. Can you help me?

Thanks in advance

choose 'custom patch' then select: com.keramidas.titaniumbackup

good luck
